name: Cookie RUN!
description:
In this game you play as a small cookie just trying to make it to its dad, Milk. However, along the way you will see that there are mouths out to eat you! Shoot them with your chocochips to destroy them and make it to safety. 

  • Use WASD controls for movement 
  • Press E to throw your Chocochips
  • Press spacebar to JUMP
